display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

switch.text: Hacking Game: Version 5 Test plan

div.div: Enter the incorrect password, SETTING, and press the enter key

switch.text: Enter the incorrect password, SETTING, and press the enter...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 17px; height: 1px; padding-top: 473px; margin-left: 10px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 57px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: - Does the game open a window?
- Does it have the title Hacking?
- Does it have aspect ratio 6:5?
- Does it have a black background?
- Does the game display a header?
- Does it consist of two content lines followed by a blank line?
- Does the first content line indicate debug mode?
- Does the second content line indicate 4 attempts left?
- Is it the top line of the window?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?
- Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
- Does the game display a password list?
- Does it consist of 13 content lines followed by a blank line?
- Does each content line contain one password?
- Is it directly below the header?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?
- Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
- Does the game prompt for a guess?
- Does it indicate the player should enter a password?
- Is it directly below the password list?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?
- Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

switch.text: - Does the game open a window?...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 487px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: - Does the game decrement the number of attempts left?
- Does it indicate 3 attempts left?
- Does the game prompt for a guess?
- Does it indicate the player should enter a password?
- Is it directly below the previous prompt?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?Â
- Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

switch.text: - Does the game decrement the number of attempts left?...

div.font: - Does the game clear the window?
- Does the game display a success outcome?
- Does it contain four content lines separated by three blank lines?
- Is the first content line the guess?Â
- Do the second and third content lines indicate success?
- Does the fourth content line prompt to press enter for exit?
- Is it in the center of the window?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?
- Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
- Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

switch.text: - Does the game clear the window?...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 326px; height: 1px; padding-top: 844px; margin-left: 33px;

div.font: - Does the game decrement the number of attempts left?
- Does it indicate 3 attempts left?
- Does the game prompt for a guess?
- Does it indicate the player should enter a password?
- Is it directly below the previous prompt?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?Â
- Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

div.font: - Does the game decrement the number of attempts left?
- Does it indicate 1 attempts left?
- Does the game display a warning?
- Does it indicate the player will be locked out?
- Is it in the bottom right corner of the window?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?Â
- Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
- Does the game prompt for a guess?
- Does it indicate the player should enter a password?
- Is it directly below the previous prompt?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?Â
- Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

div.font: - Does the game clear the window?
- Does the game display a success outcome?
- Does it contain four content lines separated by three blank lines?
- Is the first content line the guess?Â
- Do the second and third content lines indicate success?
- Does the fourth content line prompt to press enter for exit?
- Is it in the center of the window?
- Does it use small font size?
- Is it green on black?
- Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
- Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

switch.text: - Does the game clear the window?...
